450:333: sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃdhyasaṃdhikauśalena vāgakṣaraprativikalpanaṃ ca vinihatya buddhyā sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣaccāriṇo balavaśitābhijñādhāraṇīmudrāsumudritā vicitrairnirmāṇakiraṇairdaśaniṣṭhāpāde sunibaddhabuddhayo'nābhogacandrasūryamaṇimahābhūtacaryāgatisamāḥ sarvabhūmiṣu svavikalpalakṣaṇavinivṛttadṛṣṭayaḥ svapnamāyādisarvadharmānudarśanādbuddhabhūmyāśrayānupraviṣṭāḥ sarvasattvadhātuṃ yathārhattvadharmadeśanayā ākṛṣya svapnamāyādisarvadharmasadasatpakṣavarjite bhaṅgotpādavikalparahite rutānyathāparyāyavṛttyāśrayatayā pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ |
450:338: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
450:351: ete cānye ca mahāmate bālapṛthagjanānāṃ svavikalpasaṃdhayaḥ,
450:352: yāṃ saṃdhiṃ saṃdhāya bālapṛthagjanāḥ prativikalpayamānāḥ kauśeyakrimaya iva svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtreṇa ātmānaṃ parāṃśca svavikalpadṛṣṭisaṃdhisūtrarocanatayā pariveṣṭayanti bhāvābhāvasaṃdhilakṣaṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭāḥ |
450:353: na cātra mahāmate kaścitsaṃdhirna saṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ viviktadarśanātsarvadharmāṇām |
450:354: vikalpasyāpravṛttatvānmahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu viviktadarśī viharati ||
450:356: nātra kaścinmahāmate badhyate na ca mucyate,
450:360: punaraparaṃ mahāmate trayaḥ saṃdhayo bālānāṃ pṛthagjanānāṃ yaduta rāgo dveṣo mohaśca |
450:361: tṛṣṇā ca paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā yāṃ saṃdhāya gatisaṃdhayaḥ prajāyante |
450:362: tatra saṃdhisaṃdhānaṃ sattvānāṃ gatipañcakaṃ saṃdhervyucchedānmahāmate nasaṃdhirnāsaṃdhilakṣaṇaṃ prajñāyate |
450:371: punarapi mahāmatirāha-yatpunaretaduktaṃ bhagavatā-yena yena vikalpena ye ye bhāvā vikalpyante,
450:372: na hi sa teṣāṃ svabhāvo bhavati |
450:374: tadyadi bhagavan parikalpita evāsau na bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇāvadhāraṇam,
450:375: nanu te bhagavan evaṃ bruvataḥ saṃkleśavyavadānābhāvaḥ prasajyate parikalpitasvabhāvabhāvitatvātsarvadharmāṇām |
450:381: kiṃ tu yathā mahāmate āryairbhāvasvabhāvo'vadhāryate āryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñāacakṣuṣā tathā bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati ||
450:382: mahāmatirāha-tadyadi bhagavan yathā āryairāryeṇa jñānena āryeṇa darśanena āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā na divyamāṃsacakṣuṣā bhāvasvabhāvo'vadhāryate tathā bhavati,
450:385: na ca te bhagavan viparyastāḥ nāviparyastāḥ |
450:390: sa teṣāmapi bhagavan bhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parikalpitasvabhāva eva khyāyate hetvahetuvyapadeśāt |
450:391: yaduta bhāvasvalakṣaṇadṛṣṭipatitatvādanyeṣāṃ gocaro bhavati na yathā teṣām |
450:394: sa ca kathaṃ parikalpena prativikalpyamāno na tathā bhaviṣyati yathā parikalpyate ?
450:398: te ca parasparaṃ parikalpyamāne bālapṛthagjanairna tathā bhaviṣyataḥ |
450:400: yathā prativikalpena vikalpyante tathā na vidyante ||
450:401: kimidaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ tvayā nāstyastitvadṛṣṭiṃ vinivārya vastusvabhāvābhiniveśena āryajñānagocaraviṣayābhiniveśānnāstitvadṛṣṭiḥ punarnipātyate,
450:405: kiṃ tu utrāsapadavivarjanārthaṃ sattvānāṃ mahāmate mayā anādikālabhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭānāmāryajñānavastusvabhāvābhiniveśalakṣaṇadṛṣṭyā viviktadharmopadeśaḥ kriyate |
450:409: bhrānternirnimittadṛṣṭayo vimokṣatrayādhigatayāthātathyamudrāsumudritā bhāvasvabhāveṣu pratyātmādhigatayā buddhyā pratyakṣavihāriṇo bhaviṣyanti nāstyastitvavastudṛṣṭivivarjitāḥ ||
450:410: punaraparaṃ mahāmate anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā |
450:413: anutpannān sarvadharmān pratijñāya pratibruvan mahāmate bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratijñāyā hīyate |
450:418: anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti sa vādaḥ prahīyate |
450:420: sā hi mahāmate pratijñā sarvabhāvābhyantarā sadasatoranutpattilakṣaṇāt |
450:421: yadi mahāmate tayā pratijñayā anutpannayā anutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratijñāṃ kurvanti,
450:424: anutpannasvabhāvalakṣaṇā hi mahāmate teṣāṃ pratijñā bhavati |
450:426: bahudoṣaduṣṭatvādavayavānāṃ parasparahetuvilakṣaṇakṛtakatvācca avayavānāṃ pratijñā na karaṇīyā-yaduta anutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥ |
450:427: evaṃ śūnyā asvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratijñā na karaṇīyā |
450:428: kiṃ tu mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māyāsvapnavatsarvabhāvopadeśaḥ karaṇīyo dṛśyādṛśyalakṣaṇatvāt |
450:434: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ |
450:437: na hi kasyacidutpannā bhāvā vai pratyayānvitāḥ || 49 ||
450:444: nimittaṃ vastu vijñaptiṃ manovispanditaṃ ca tat |
450:445: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te || 53 ||
450:446: ajale ca jalagrāho mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe |
450:447: dṛśyaṃ tathā hi bālānāmāryāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ || 54 ||
450:452: kathaṃ hyabhāvo bhāvānāṃ kurute samatāṃ katham || 56 ||
450:453: yadā cittaṃ na jānāti bāhyamādhyātmikaṃ calam |
450:455: punarapi mahāmatirāha-yatpunaridamuktaṃ bhagavatā-yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavati |
450:467: jñeye sati bhagavan jñānaṃ pravartate nābhāvāt |
450:475: na caitatsaṃdhāyoktaṃ mayā-yadā tvālambyamarthaṃ nopalabhate jñānaṃ tadā vijñaptimātravyavasthānaṃ bhavatīti |
450:479: na ca tārkikā anādikālabhāvābhāvaprapañcavāsitamataya evaṃ prajānanti |
450:480: te cāprajānanto bāhyadravyasaṃsthānalakṣaṇabhāvābhāvaṃ kṛtvā vikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ cittamātratāṃ nirdekṣyanti |
450:484: vidyamānaṃ hi ālambyaṃ yadi jñānaṃ na paśyati |
450:485: ajñānaṃ taddhi na jñānaṃ tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ || 58 ||
450:490: punaraparaṃ mahāmate bālapṛthagjanā anādikālaprapañcadauṣṭhulyasvaprativikalpanā nāṭake nṛtyantaḥ svasiddhāntanayadeśanāyāmakuśalāḥ svacittadṛśyabāhyabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniviṣṭā upāyadeśanāpāṭhamabhiniviśante,
450:493: deśayatu me bhagavān deśanāsiddhāntanayalakṣaṇaṃ yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anāgate'dhvani deśanāsiddhāntanayakuśalā na vipralabhyeran kutārkikaistīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikaiḥ |
450:497: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
450:498: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-dviprakāro mahāmate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmanayo yaduta deśanānayaśca siddhāntapratyavasthānanayaśca |
450:502: yena yoginaḥ svacittadṛśyavikalpavyāvṛttiṃ kurvanti yaduta ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapakṣāpatanatācittamanomanovijñānātītaṃ svapratyātmāryagatigocaraṃ hetuyuktidṛṣṭilakṣaṇavinivṛttamanālīḍhaṃ sarvakutārkikaistīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikairnāstyastitvāntadvayapatitaiḥ,
450:504: etanmahāmate siddhāntanayadeśanālakṣaṇaṃ yatra tvayā ca anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvairyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ||
450:506: nayo hi dvividho mahyaṃ siddhānto deśanā ca vai |
450:508: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-uktametadbhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ekasmin kāle ekasmin samaye yathā lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ,
450:509: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti |
450:511: yaṃ ca sevamānasya lokāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgrahaḥ ?
450:512: bhagavānāha-vicitramantrapratibhāno mahāmate lokāyatiko vicitrairhetupadavyañjanairbālān vyāmohayati na yuktiyuktaṃ nārthopasaṃhitam |
450:514: etena mahāmate kāraṇena lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāna ityucyate |
450:520: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate lokāyatiko vicitramantrapratibhāno'parimukta eva jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsādibhyo vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairbālān vyāmohayati ||
450:522: tacchiṣyeṇa nāgaveśarūpadhāriṇā svarge indasabhāyāṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā tava vā sahasrāro ratho bhajyatāṃ mama vā ekaikanāgabhāvasya phaṇācchedo bhavatviti |
450:523: sahadharmeṇa ca nāgaveśadhāriṇā lokāyatikaśiṣyeṇa devānāmindraṃ vijitya sahasrāraṃ rathaṃ bhaṅktvā punarapīmaṃ lokamāgataḥ |
450:524: evamidaṃ mahāmate lokāyatikavicitrahetudṛṣṭāntopanibaddhaṃ yena tiryañco'pyadhītya devāsuralokaṃ vicitrapadavyañjanairvyāmohayati |
450:527: na sevitavyo na bhajitavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ |
450:528: śarīrabuddhiviṣayopalabdhimātraṃ hi mahāmate lokāyatikairdeśyate vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ |
450:530: kiṃ tu paścime loke paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ bhaviṣyati kutarkahetudṛṣṭipraṇītatvāt |
450:532: evadeva mahāmate lokāyataṃ bhinnasaṃhitaṃ vicitrahetūpanibaddhaṃ tīrthakarairdeśyate svakāraṇābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭaiḥ,
450:536: na svanayaṃ ca na prajānanti mohohāllokāyatamidamiti ||
450:539: atha kiṃ bhagavānapi lokāyatameva deśayati āgatāgatānāṃ nānādeśasaṃnipatitānāṃ devāsuramanuṣyāṇāṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ,
450:541: bhagavānāha-nāhaṃ mahāmate lokāyataṃ deśayāmi na cāyavyayam |
450:543: tatra āyo nāma mahāmate utpādarāśiḥ samūhāgamādutpadyate |
450:552: atha yenāhaṃ tena lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa upasaṃkrāntaḥ |
450:553: upasaṃkramya akṛtāvakāśa eva māmevamāha-sarvaṃ bho gautama kṛtakam |
450:554: tasyāhaṃ mahāmate evamāha-sarvaṃ bho brāhmaṇa yadi kṛtakam,
450:559: evaṃ sarvamanityaṃ sarvaṃ nityaṃ sarvamutpādyaṃ sarvamanutpādyam |
450:561: punarapi mahāmate māmevamāha brāhmaṇo lokāyatikaḥ-sarvaṃ bho gautama ekatvaṃ sarvamanyatvaṃ sarvamubhayatvaṃ sarvamanubhayatvaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇādhīnaṃ vicitrahetūipapattidarśanāt |
450:563: punarapi bho gautama sarvamavyākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vyākṛtam,
450:566: asti paro loko nāsti paro lokaḥ,
450:572: tasyaitaduktaṃ mahāmate mahā-yadi bho brāhmaṇa evam,
450:573: idamapi brāhmaṇa lokāyatameva bhavatīti, na madīyam |
450:578: ahaṃ bhe brāhmaṇa na hetuvādī nāhetuvādī anyatra vikalpameva grāhyagrāhakabhāvena prajñāpya pratītyasamutpādaṃ deśayāmi |
450:579: na ca tvādṛśā anye vā budhyante ātmagrāhapatitayā saṃtatyā |
450:582: punarapi mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇa evamāha-ajñānatṛṣṇākarmahetukamidaṃ bho gautama tribhavam,
450:588: punaraparaṃ mahāmate lokāyatiko brāhmaṇo māmetadavocat-asti bho gautama kiṃcidyanna lokāyatam ?
450:589: madīyameva bho gautama sarvatīrthakaraiḥ prasiddhaṃ vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairhetudṛṣṭāntopasaṃhārairdeśyate |
450:590: asti bho brāhmaṇa yanna tvadīyaṃ na ca na prasiddhaṃ deśyate na ca na vicitraiḥ padavyañjanairna ca nārthopasaṃhitameva |
450:591: kiṃ tadalokāyataṃ yanna prasiddhaṃ deśyate ca ?
450:592: asti ca bho brāhmaṇa alokāyataṃ yatra sarvatīrthakarāṇāṃ tava ca buddhirna gāhate bāhyabhāvādasadbhūtavikalpaprapañcābhiniviṣṭānām |
450:593: yaduta vikalpasyāpravṛttiḥ sadasataḥ svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādvikalpo na pravartate |
450:599: saṃkṣepato brāhmaṇa yatra vijñānasyāgatirgatiścyutirupapattiḥ prārthanābhiniveśābhiṣvaṅgo darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ parāmṛṣṭirvicitralakṣaṇābhiniveśaḥ saṃgatiḥ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kāraṇābhiniveśaśca |
450:600: etadbho brāhmaṇa tvadīyaṃ lokāyataṃ na madīyam |
450:603: atha khalu kṛṣṇapakṣiko nāgarājo brāhmaṇarūpeṇāgatya bhagavantametadavocat-tena hi gautama paraloka eva na saṃvidyate |
450:607: atha māṇavo niṣpratibhāno nigṛhīto'ntarhito'pṛṣṭvaiva māṃ svanayapratyavasthānakathāṃ cintayan śākyaputro mannayabahirdhā varāko'pravṛttilakṣaṇahetuvādī svavikalpadṛśyalakṣaṇāvabodhādvikalpasyāpravṛttiṃ varṇayati |
450:608: tvaṃ caitarhi mahāmate māṃ pṛcchasi-kiṃ kāraṇaṃ lokāyatikavicitramantrapratibhānaṃ sevyamānasyāmiṣasaṃgraho bhavati na dharmasaṃgraha iti |
450:611: padārthadvayaṃ prati mīmāṃsā pravṛttā anāgatāṃ janatāṃ samālokya |
450:613: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
450:615: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ||
450:617: yaduta āmiṣamāmṛśamākarṣaṇaṃ nirmṛṣaṃ parāmṛṣṭiḥ svādo bāhyaviṣayābhiniveśo'ntadvayapraveśaḥ |
450:618: kudṛṣṭyā punaḥ skandhaprādurbhāvo jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsapravṛttistṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā ādiṃ kṛtvā |
450:620: eṣa mahāmate āmiṣasaṃgraho na dharmasaṃgraho yaṃ lokāyatikaṃ sevamāno labhate lokāyatam ||
450:627: prāyeṇa hi mahāmate tīrthakaravādo bālānantadvaye pātayati na tu viduṣām,
450:641: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo'sti dvidhā cittaṃ hi dṛśyate |
450:649: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇamiti bhagavannucyate |
450:655: na ca bhavati teṣāṃ vikalpānurupaṃ nirvāṇam |
450:656: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
450:661: anye punardeśāntarasthānagamanaṃ mokṣa iti varṇayanti viṣayavikalpoparamādiṣu pavanavat |
450:664: anye punarvarṇayanti vividhanimittavikalpo duḥkhajanmavāhaka iti svacittadṛśyamātrākuśalāḥ |
450:668: anye punarmahāmate tīrthakarā durvidagdhabuddhayaḥ prakṛtipuruṣāntaradarśanādguṇapariṇāmakartṛtvācca nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti |
450:672: anye anyonyapravṛtto'yaṃ saṃbhavo jagata iti na kāraṇataḥ |
450:678: anye svabhāvataḥ pravṛttito mayūravaicitryavividharatnākarakaṇṭakataikṣṇyavadbhāvānāṃ svabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇaṃ vikalpayanti |
450:686: anye punarmahāmate varṇayanti sarvajñasiṃhanādanādino yathā svacittadṛśyamātrāvabodhādbāhyabhāvābhāvānabhiniveśāccātuṣkoṭikarahitād yathābhūtāvasthānadarśanātsvacittadṛśyavikalpasyāntadvayāpatanatayā grāhyagrāhakānupalabdheḥ sarvapramāṇāgrahaṇāpravṛttidarśanāttattvasya vyāmohakatvādagrahaṇaṃ tattvasya,
450:688: evamanyānyapi yāni tārkikaiḥ kutīrthyapraṇītāni tānyayuktiyuktāni vidvadbhiḥ parivarjitāni |
450:689: sarve'pyete mahāmate antadvayapatitayā saṃtatyā nirvāṇaṃ kalpayanti |
450:691: na cātra kaścitpravartate vā nivartate vā |
450:692: ekaikasya mahāmate tīrthakarasya nirvāṇaṃ tatsvaśāstramatibuddhyā parīkṣyamāṇaṃ vyabhicarati |
450:695: atra tvayā mahāmate śikṣitvā anyaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvatīrthakaranirvāṇadṛṣṭirvyāvartanīyā ||
450:700: tīrthyā mokṣaṃ vikalpenti na ca mokṣo hi vidyate || 70 ||
450:709: yathā hi darpaṇe rūpaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate |
450:716: vikalpaṃ dṛśyate citraṃ na ca bālairvibhāvyate || 77 ||
450:719: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavāṃstathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ svabuddhabuddhatām,
450:720: yena ahaṃ ca anye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatasvakuśalāḥ svamātmānaṃ parāṃścāvabodhayeyuḥ |
450:724: mahāmatirāha-kiṃ punarbhagavan tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'kṛtakaḥ kṛtakaḥ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇamabhidhānamabhidheyaṃ buddhirboddhavyaḥ,
450:726: bhagavānāha-na mahāmate tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha evamādyaiḥ padaniruktairakṛtako na kṛtakaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam |
450:729: yadi hi mahāmate tathāgataḥ kṛtakaḥ syāt,
450:732: aniṣṭaṃ caitanmama ca anyeṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām |
450:736: yacca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tanna sannāsat |
450:741: vandhyāputro hi mahāmate vāgmātraṃ na cātuṣkoṭikapatitaḥ |
450:747: svātmanā sarvadharmā vidyante na parātmanā gośvavat |
450:748: tadyathā mahāmate na gobhāvo'śvātmako na cāśvabhāvo gavātmakaḥ,
450:752: evameva mahāmate sarvadharmā na ca svalakṣaṇena na saṃvidyante |
450:779: yaddhi mahāmate na nityaṃ nānityaṃ na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ na saṃskṛtaṃ nāsaṃskṛtaṃ na buddhirna boddhavyaṃ na lakṣyaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ na skandhā na skandhebhyo'nyat nābhidheyaṃ nābhidhānaṃ naikatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvasaṃbaddham,
450:785: ākāśaṃ ca mahāmate na kāryaṃ na kāraṇam |
450:786: yacca na kāryaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tannirālambyam |
450:794: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit |
450:795: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkenacitkathaṃ tasya vibhāvanā || 80 ||
450:796: na kṛtako nākṛtako na kāryaṃ nāpi kāraṇam |
450:797: na ca skandhā na cāskandhā na cāpyanyatra saṃkarāt || 81 ||
450:798: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na dṛśyate |
450:799: na taṃ nāstyeva gantavyaṃ dharmāṇāmeva dharmatā || 82 ||
450:801: ato nāsti na gantavyamastitvaṃ na ca kalpayet || 83 ||
450:805: tadā samyakprapaśyanti na te dūṣenti nāyakān || 85 ||
450:806: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu me bhagavān,
450:812: yadbhagavānevamāha-aniruddhā anutpannāśca bhagavatā sarvadharmā deśyante sadasatpakṣādarśanāt |
450:813: yadyanutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti bhagavan dharmagrahaṇaṃ na prāpnoti,
450:820: sādhu bhagavanniti mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt |
450:821: bhagavāṃstasyaitadavocat-na hi mahāmate abhāvastathāgato na ca sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhānutpādagrahaṇam |
450:822: na pratyayo'pekṣitavyo na ca nirarthakamanutpādagrahaṇaṃ kriyate mayā |
450:823: kiṃ tu mahāmate manomayadharmakāyasya tathāgatasyaitadadhivacanaṃ yatra sarvatīrthakaraśrāvakapratyekabuddhasaptabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāmaviṣayaḥ |
450:831: ityevamādyānāṃ bhāvānāmekaikasya bhāvasya bahavaḥ paryāyavācakāḥ śabdā bhavanti vikalpitāḥ |
450:834: evaṃ mahāmate ahamapi sahāyāṃ lokadhātau tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairbālānāṃ śravaṇāvabhāsamāgacchāmi |
450:836: na ca prajānanti tathāgatasyaite nāmaparyāyā iti |
450:839: nāyakaṃ vināyakaṃ pariṇāyakaṃ buddhamṛṣiṃ vṛṣabhaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viṣṇumīśvaraṃ pradhānaṃ kapilaṃ bhūtāntamariṣṭaneminaṃ somaṃ bhāskaraṃ rāmaṃ vyāsaṃ śukamindraṃ baliṃ varuṇamiti caike saṃjānanti |
450:840: apare anirodhānutpādaṃ śūnyatāṃ tathatāṃ satyatāṃ bhūtatāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ dharmadhātuṃ nirvāṇaṃ nityaṃ samatāmadvayamanirodhamanimittaṃ pratyayaṃ buddhahetūpadeśaṃ vimokṣaṃ mārgasatyāni sarvajñaṃ jinaṃ manomayamiti caike saṃjānanti |
450:841: evamādibhirmahāmate paripūrṇaṃ tribhirnāmāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrairanūnairanadhikairihānyeṣu ca lokadhātuṣu māṃ janāḥ saṃjānante udakacandra ivāpraviṣṭanirgatam |
450:842: na ca bālā avabudhyante dvayāntapatitayā saṃtatyā |
450:843: atha ca satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti ca māṃ padārthaniruktyakuśalā abhinnasaṃjñāḥ,
450:845: anirodhānutpādamabhāvaṃ kalpayiṣyanti na ca tathāgatanāmapadaparyāyāntaramindraśakrapuraṃdaraṃ na svanayapratyavasthānapāṭhamadhimokṣanti,
450:847: evaṃ ca mahāmate vakṣyanti te mohapuruṣāḥ-yathāruta evārthaḥ,
450:852: na tvevaṃ jñāsyanti mahāmate yathā rutamutpannapradhvaṃsi,
450:857: na ca mahāmate tathāgatā akṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti |
450:859: anyatra akṣarapatitāśayaḥ punarmahāmate yo'kṣarapatitaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
450:862: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate uktaṃ deśanāpāṭhe mayā anyaiśca buddhabodhisattvaiḥ yathaikamapyakṣaraṃ tathāgatā nodāharanti na pratyāharantīti |
450:870: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena deśanāpāṭharutānabhiniviṣṭena bhavitavyam |
450:872: sattvāśayapravṛttatvānnānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanā kriyate cittamanomanovijñānavyāvṛttyarthaṃ mayā anyaiśca tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
450:874: arthapratiśaraṇena mahāmate bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśaraṇena |
450:875: vyañjanānusārī mahāmate kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svātmānaṃ ca nāśayati,
450:877: kudṛṣṭipatitayā saṃtatyā svapakṣaṃ vibhrāmyate kutīrthakaiḥ sarvadharmabhūmisvalakṣaṇākuśalaiḥ padaniruktyanabhijñaiḥ ||
450:881: mahāyāne ca mahāmate samyakparigṛhyamāṇe buddhaśrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ parigrahaḥ kṛto bhavati |
450:886: atasteṣu viśiṣṭāyatanapratilambheṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā upapattiṃ parigṛhya mahāyāne pratiṣṭhāpanatayā daśavaśitāvicitrarūpaveśadhāriṇo bhūtvā sattvaviśeṣānuśayalakṣaṇagatibhūtāstathātvāya dharmaṃ deśayanti ||
450:889: tena na mahāmate kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā yathārutārthābhiniveśakuśalena bhavitavyam |
450:894: evameva mahāmate bālajātīyā iva bālapṛthagjanavargā yathārutāṅgulyagrābhiniveśābhiniviṣṭā eva kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
450:896: tadyathā mahāmate annaṃ bhojyaṃ bālānāṃ ca kaścidanabhisaṃskṛtaṃ paribhoktum |
450:902: ata etena kāraṇena mahāmate arthābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
450:906: bāhuśrutyaṃ ca nāma mahāmate yaduta arthakauśalyaṃ na rutakauśalyam |
450:908: yathā svayaṃ ca na patati parāṃśca na pātayati |
450:912: punaraparaṃ mahāmatirbuddhādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhita evamāha-na bhagavatā anirodhānutpādadarśanena kiṃcidviśiṣyate |
450:916: tīrthakarā api bhagavan kāraṇapratyayahetukīṃ jagata utpattiṃ varṇayanti |
450:926: yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā bhūto bhūtasvabhāvaṃ na vijahāti |
450:929: viśeṣo vātra vaktavyo yena tathāgatavādo viśeṣyate,
450:931: aviśiṣyamāṇe bhagavan svavāde tīrthakarāṇāmapi buddhaprasaṅgaḥ syādanirodhānutpādahetutvāt |
450:932: asthānamanavakāśaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatā yadekatra lokadhātau bahavastathāgatā utpadyeranniti |
450:936: tīrthakarāṇāṃ hi mahāmate bhāvasvabhāvo vidyata evānutpannāvikaralakṣaṇaprāptaḥ |
450:938: mama tu mahāmate sadasatpakṣavigata utpādabhaṅgavirahito na bhāvo nābhāavaḥ,
450:946: tadyathā mahāmate kaścidgandharvanagare bālajātīyo māyāpuruṣasattvasārthavaicitryaṃ praviaśantaṃ vā nirgacchantaṃ vā kalpayet-amī praviṣṭā amī nirgatāḥ |
450:947: na ca tatra kaścitpraviṣṭo vā nirgato vā |
450:951: na ca māyāpuruṣa utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā bhāvābhāvākiṃcitkaratvāt |
450:953: anyatra vitathapatitayā saṃjñayā bālā utpādanirodhaṃ kalpayanti na tvāryāḥ |
450:954: tatra vitathamiti mahāmate na tathā yathā bhāvasvabhāvaḥ kalpyate |
450:958: ata etasmātkāraṇānmahāmate animittadarśanameva śreyo na nimittadarśanam |
450:961: tatra nirvāṇamiti mahāmate yathābhūtārthasthānadarśanaṃ vikalpacittacaittakalāpasya parāvṛttipūrvakam |
450:966: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca |
450:976: anutpāde prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati |
450:978: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo'hetuko bhavet |
450:979: nāhetuko na hetubhyo yadā paśyanti saṃskṛtam |
450:982: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me || 93 ||
450:983: na cābhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayavīkṣaṇam |
450:984: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam || 94 ||
450:997: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā || 100 ||
450:999: kalāpācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate || 101 ||
450:1000: bhāvo na vidyate'nyo'nyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit |
450:1008: yasya janyo bhavedbhāvaḥ saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit |
450:1020: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit |
450:1021: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ || 112 ||
450:1022: yadi janyo na bhāvo'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt |
450:1025: kalāpo'yaṃ na dharmo'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā || 114 ||
450:1027: na tu śāstrasya bhedo'sti doṣabhedāttu bhidyate || 115 ||
450:1029: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi prāṇinām || 116 ||
450:1032: atha khalu mahāmatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat-anityatā anityateti bhagavan sarvatīrthakarairvikalpyate |
450:1033: tvayā ca sarvadeśanāpāṭhe deśyate-anityā bata saṃskārā utpādavyayadharmiṇa iti |
450:1036: bhagavānāha-aṣṭaprakārā hi mahāmate sarvatīrthakarairanityatā kalpyate, na tu mayā |
450:1043: nairantaryaprabandhena svarasabhaṅgabhedaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ kṣīradadhipariṇāmavikārāntaravadadṛṣṭanaṣṭā sarvabhāveṣu pravartate na nityateti |
450:1048: tatra anutpādānityatā nāma yaduta nityamanityaṃ sadasatorapravṛttiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmadarśanaṃ paramāṇupravicayādadarśanam |
450:1050: etaddhi mahāmate anutpādānityatāyā lakṣaṇaṃ yasyānavabodhātsarvatīrthakarā utpādānityatāvāde prapatanti ||
450:1059: na ca kāryakāraṇayorviśeṣo'sti iyamanityatā idaṃ kāryamiti |
450:1063: na ca kāraṇaṃ visadṛśaṃ kāryaṃ janayati |
450:1072: anityatvādayaḥ sarvabhāvā nityāḥ syurnityā eva bhaveyuḥ ||
450:1075: tatra yadatītaṃ rūpaṃ tattena saha vinaṣṭam |
450:1080: sarvatīrthakarāṇāmavināśātsarvabhūtānāṃ sarvaṃ tribhavaṃ bhūtabhautikaṃ yatrotpādasthitivikāraḥ prajñapyate |
450:1082: bhūtāni ca na pravartante na nivartante svabhāvalakṣaṇābhiniveśāt ||
450:1083: tatra prārambhavinivṛttirnāma anityatā-na punarbhūtāni bhūtāntaramārabhante parasparavilakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇānna viśeṣaḥ prārabhyate |
450:1085: tatra saṃsthānavinivṛttirnāma anityatā-yaduta na bhūtabhautikaṃ vinaśyati ā pralayāt |
450:1086: pralayo nāma mahāmate ā paramāṇoḥ pravicayaparīkṣā vināśo bhūtabhautikasya saṃsthānasyānyathābhūtadarśanāddīrghahrasvānulabdhiḥ |
450:1088: tatra saṃsthānānityatā nāma-yaduta yasya rūpamevānityaṃ tasya saṃsthānasyānityatā na bhūtānām |
450:1094: tatra vikārānityatā nāma-yaduta rūpasyānyathābhūtadarśanaṃ na bhūtānāṃ suvarṇasaṃsthānabhūṣaṇavikāradarśanavat |
450:1095: na suvarṇaṃ bhāvādvinaśyati kiṃ tu bhūṣaṇasaṃsthānavināśo bhavati ||
450:1100: mama tu mahāmate na nityā nānityā |
450:1107: trividhaṃ ca mahāmate sarvatīrthakaralauikikalokottaratamānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vāgvikalpaviniḥsṛtānām |
450:1112: bhāvānāṃ nāsti vai nāśaṃ bhūtā bhūtātmanā sthitāḥ |
450:1114: kasyacinna hi tīrthyasya vināśo na ca saṃbhavaḥ |
